name: U.N.S.T.A.B.L.E. (Post Deadline)
description:
Our game is all about U.N.S.T.A.B.L.E. as an acronym. We tried to make weird little sentences out of these letters that we turned into mini-games. But the mini-games are unstable themselves, and sometimes take an unexpected turn. 

We originally wanted to make tons of minigames, but you know how it is with gamejams. We could only make a few, but please just imagine we made like 20! ;)

Thank you so much for playing!

Developing: @re-markable

Art/Animation/Audio: @mizuiro

Art/Audio/VFX: @koalaura

We only used 3rd-party assets for the fonts and the audio (which we then edited ourselves), and checked the licenses on all of those.
